snippet.title: RemiLore (Switch, PS4, Xbox One, Steam) Announcement Trailer!
snippet.description:
RemiLore: Lost Girl in the Lands of Lore is a roguelike action game coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Steam in winter 2018! 

In RemiLore, players utilize intuitive twin-stick controls to battle fearsome enemies and engage in epic boss battles. The adventure begins when an ordinary schoolgirl named Remi awakens Lore, a supreme magic book. Together, fate takes them both to the magical world of Ragnoah, which has been overtaken by fierce mecha-monsters. Remi and Lore must venture together in a quest to find their way home, but can Remi really trust the mischievous magic book Lore?

Check out our blog for up-to-the-minute information on RemiLore and all the other exciting Nicalis games that are coming your way! https://blog.nicalis.com/
